description: Tiizi Exercise Catalog - 113 unique exercises with complete schema compliance

documents.name: Plank (Forearm Plank)
documents.description: A strength exercise targeting Abs, Obliques for beginner-level fitness enthusiasts. This core movement focuses on strength development.
setup: Start in kneeling position on mat
Place forearms on ground, elbows under shoulders
Extend legs back one at a time onto toes
Create straight line from head to heels

breathing.inhale: Take steady breaths in through your nose
breathing.exhale: Breathe out through your mouth
breathing.pattern: Maintain steady, rhythmic breathing throughout the hold - never hold your breath

formCues: Keep hips level - don't sag or pike
Press away from ground with forearms
commonMistakes: Allowing hips to sag toward ground
Piking hips too high in air
progressions: Perform on elevated surface (hands on bench)
safetyNotes: Stop immediately if you feel sharp pain
Avoid if you have recent shoulder injuries
Modify if experiencing lower back pain
Don't hold breath - breathe continuously

documents.name: Abdominal Crunches
documents.description: A strength exercise targeting Abs, Hip Flexors for beginner-level fitness enthusiasts. This core movement focuses on strength development.
setup: Lie flat on your back on a mat
Bend knees with feet flat on floor
Place hands behind head or crossed on chest
Engage core and prepare to lift
execution: Engage core and lift shoulders off ground
Pause briefly at top of movement

breathing.inhale: Breathe in during the eccentric (lowering) phase
breathing.exhale: Breathe out during the concentric (exertion) phase
breathing.pattern: Coordinate breath with movement - never hold your breath

formCues: Engage core by pulling navel to spine
Keep lower back pressed to floor
safetyNotes: Stop immediately if you feel sharp pain
Avoid if you have recent shoulder injuries
Modify if experiencing lower back pain
Don't hold breath - breathe continuously
